list.name: The Narzissenkreuz Adventure
list.desc: In Fontaine, where there aren't supposed to be any Oceanids, you meet a tiny Oceanid...

list.name: Fontaine Research Institute, Stagnating in the Rubble
list.desc: After navigating an incredibly cumbersome procedure, you take on an assignment related to the Fontaine Research Institute. But before you can officially begin, though, you have to undergo a final review...

list.name: Through the Looking Glass
list.desc: Something seems to have changed...

list.name: An Expected Lie
list.desc: The recipient of the shipment is actually the "long dead" Edwin. Although his mental state seems a bit worrying, and he constantly repeats the number "five"... he seems to have surreptitiously pointed out Nacker's current whereabouts. What is this "resurrected" researcher planning? Regardless of what it may be, the important matter at hand is capturing Nacker...

list.name: An Expected Plan
list.desc: After a thorough investigation, the Fontaine Research Institute seems to have found a lead on Nacker and the Arkhium Kinetic Core. Now, all that's left is to bring him to justic.

list.name: Shrouded Vale, Hidden Hero
list.desc: Uncover the secret left behind by Guhua

list.name: Scrolls and Sword Manuals of Guhua
list.desc: Uncover the secret left behind by Guhua

list.name: Our Chenyu Vale Trek
list.desc: Hezhe Post seems to be organizing an interesting event named "Our Chenyu Vale Trek"...

list.name: A Wangshan Walk to Remember
list.desc: At Huang the Third's invitation, you arrive at the legendary place where the treasure of the Guhua Clan is located, Wangshan Hall...

list.name: The Roaming Abode
list.desc: At night, out in the wild, you encounter a little girl standing on a bamboo raft...

list.name: Threefold Expectations
list.desc: Something seems to be wrong with three Monoliths within the mountains...

list.name: Temporary Acclimatization
list.desc: The hydrologist Woliu seems distressed about something...

list.name: Chili Con Cloudy
list.desc: You encounter an anxious merchant in a camp out in the wild...

list.name: Qiaoying, the Village of Many Tales
list.desc: You once again meet the slightly paranoid author, Guijarro, in Qiaoying Village...

list.name: Chenyu's Blessings of Sunken Jade
list.desc: A World Quest Series following the request of Fujin, an adeptus, to resolve the disharmony of Chenyu Vale's soil and water.

list.name: The Cloud-Padded Path to the Chiwang Repose
list.desc: Paimon is a bit worried about Adeptus Fujin’s condition. If you have time, it might be good to pay another visit to Chiwang Terrace.

list.name: Silently the Butterfly Crosses the Valley
list.desc: Yaodie Valley seems to conceal secrets unknown to all…

list.name: The Dealing Sands
list.desc: Two groups of unknown individuals are fighting fiercely in the wilderness. What in the world is going on?

list.name: Pursuit (Part 1)
list.desc: Enter the World of Meditation to look for Canotila.

list.name: Qiaoying of the Sacred Mountain
list.desc: On first arriving at Chenyu Vale, you are asked by the adeptus, Fujin, to help investigate imbalances in the local water and soil…

list.name: Floating Jade, Treasure of Chenyu
list.desc: Little Mao seems to have some information about how to help heal Chenyu Vale...

list.name: An Ancient Sacrifice of Sacred Brocade
list.desc: Help the Adeptus Fujin complete a ritual that will heal the land of Chenyu Vale.

list.name: The Shadow Over Petrichor
list.desc: You encounter a series of strange occurrences after arriving in Petrichor for the first time. You decide to get to the bottom of it all…

list.name: Underwater Nocturne
list.desc: In order to rescue the people of Petrichor, you follow the strange cat named "Osse" into the mysterious Faded Castle...

list.name: The Last Day of Remuria
list.desc: After learning the true identity of "Monsieur Os," you decide to go to the Sea of Bygone Eras to track down Boethius...

list.name: Gradus ad Capitolium
list.desc: After passing through the perilous oceanic trench, you finally arrive at the ancient sunken capital of Remuria. Next, you must head to "Domus Aurea" for a showdown with Boethius...

list.name: Fortune Plango Vulnera
list.desc: For Monsieur Os, and for everyone in town, take on Boethius in a final battle!

list.name: For Yesterday and Tomorrow
list.desc: Now that everything is over, it is time to go back to Petrichor to check up on the situation...

list.name: Where His Life Lies
list.desc: You see a familiar face in the Court of Fontaine...

list.name: Latecoming Homecoming
list.desc: Giustino has made up his mind to return to his hometown, Petrichor...

list.name: Daydreams Beyond Space and Time
list.desc: Garcia and company are preparing to return to Petrichor...

list.name: Canticles of Harmony
list.desc: A World Quest Series following Osse, a mysterious white cat, to resolve the crisis Petrichor is facing.

list.name: Unbegun, Unending Story
list.desc: The sacrifice demanded by magic is consolation...

list.name: Between Pledge and Forgettance
list.desc: A World Quest Series following Little One, a little Tepetlisaurus that received "Blessing," to cure it.

list.name: Lost in the Woods
list.desc: After having just arrived in Natlan, you are teleported to a strange space...

list.name: Rite of the Bold
list.desc: Go to the Children of Echoes and search for clues concerning the Volcanic Token.

list.name: Revelations from the Past
list.desc: You have obtained permission to make a pilgrimage to the volcano from Pacal. Set out with Little One after you finish your preparations.

list.name: Shadows of the Mountains
list.desc: A World Quest series following Titu, a storyteller, to investigate the Shadow Pins.

list.name: Beneath the Crystal Rock
list.desc: Help Titu resolve the Shadow Pin issue and reinforce the seal placed upon the Abyss.

list.name: Peace to the Slumbering
list.desc: The Greater Shadow Pin falls, opening a huge hole in the ground...

list.name: Tale of Dreams Plucked From Fire
list.desc: A World Quest series following Chikya, a woman of the Night-Wind Clan, to search for the "panacea."

list.name: Tracer No Tracing
list.desc: In the depths of some searing ruins, you meet a young woman...

list.name: Seeker No Finding
list.desc: Search for the legendary "elixir that can cure all injuries" with Chikya.

list.name: In the Footsteps of the Chosen of Dragons
list.desc: A World Quest Series following the many adventures of Little One, Traveler and Paimon in Natlan.

list.name: Treasures and Collectors
list.desc: Try your luck at the Saurian Relics Excavation Site!

list.name: Special Friends
list.desc: Your Saurian buddy wants to make some new friends...

list.name: Feeling Like Fish Today!
list.desc: Wouldn't it be great if you could catch some fish for your Saurian buddy...? Ace Angler Paimon you're up!

list.name: Lies and Promises
list.desc: You discover a Yumkasaurus standing in the way of some treasure. Can you find a way to make it leave...?

list.name: Lights, Kamera, Action!
list.desc: It's time you shot a film starring your Saurian companion!

list.name: A Saurian Lover's Ordinary Days
list.desc: You encounter someone surrounded by three Saurians out in the wild...

list.name: Tepetlisaurus Hide-and-Seek
list.desc: After running into a whole bunch of Tepetlisaurus while you're out on the road, you let Little One go off to play with them. But then it doesn't come back...

list.name: Weighty Wings
list.desc: You find an injured Saurian in the wild...

list.name: Gifts and Gifts in Return
list.desc: Your Saurian companion gifts you the treasures it had been carefully collecting. Now, what would make a good thank-you gift...?

list.name: Waiting For Seeds to Sprout
list.desc: Little One digs up a strange seed...

list.name: To the Night, What is the Night's
list.desc: You encounter a strange door out in the wilds of Natlan...

list.name: To Wish Upon a Star
list.desc: You encounter a child looking for star shards out in the wild...

list.name: The Case of the Crafting Bench
list.desc: You discover a strange Crafting Bench in the Stadium of the Sacred Flame...

list.name: Stride on Rainbows, Split the Waves
list.desc: Near the People of the Springs, you meet Rongo, who wants to test the training grounds...

list.name: Lost Traveler in the Ashen Realm
list.desc: A World Quest Series following Bona and Coco, an adventurer and her companion, to find the Jade of Return and track the evil dragon down.

list.name: City Buried By Ash
list.desc: After an ambush from the evil dragon, you begin to explore Ochkanatlan in search of the Jade of Return.

list.name: Vaulting the Wall of Morning Mist
list.desc: To find the unknown treasure known as the Jade of Return and track the evil dragon down, you have stepped into ancient ruins to which entry is considered forbidden...

list.name: A Dream of Gazing Upon the Distant Sky
list.desc: Following the guidance of Cocouik, the traveler searches the ruins of Ochkanatlan to open the road to the skies.

list.name: Adventure in the Land of Mists
list.desc: After finally repelling the evil dragon, you and the self-proclaimed adventurer Bona set off on a journey alongside the mysterious Cocouik to find the Tonatiuh and the Jade of Return...

list.name: Palace of the Vision Serpent
list.desc: Following Cocouik's guidance, you come to the palace ruins on Ochkanatlan's upper levels. There seems to be something hidden beneath these ruins...

list.name: To the Sky-Road
list.desc: With two pieces of Pyrophosphorite in hand, the road to the skies is open to you at last...

list.name: The Tonatiuh Quivers
list.desc: Upon landing at the Legendary Tonatiuh, the mysteries of Bona, Cocouik, the evil dragon, and the Jade of return start to unravel.

list.name: The Flowing Primal Flame
list.desc: According to Bona, you need to collect burning Firestones and offer them up to the Altar of Primal Flame if you wish to find the Jade of Return...

list.name: The Other Side of the Sky
list.desc: Passing through an ocean of clouds, you finally arrive at the legendary Tonatiuh...

list.name: Moment of Awakening
list.desc: To get the Jade of Return, you chase the evil dragon all the way to the very end...

list.name: The Chosen One's Promise
list.desc: Go back to Tonatiuh and meet up with your companions.

list.name: From One Case to Another
list.desc: Aid Taruka in the Scorchwind Trial Grounds, to investigate the suspicious Lamizana.

list.name: Incidents Are Ever Sudden
list.desc: At Pakpaka Flying School, what seemed like just another routine challenge mission at first...

list.name: Beat the Clock: 24 Hours
list.desc: The plot thickens...

list.name: Friends of Fire and Water
list.desc: You and Paimon discover a suspicious campsite somewhere within the Flower-Feathered Clan territory. There, you unexpectedly rescue a Blubberbeast. It seems to make a good friend for your Saurian companion...

list.name: Sauro-Vet's Dilemma
list.desc: You encounter a Qucusaurus attacking a human, but there seems to be more to this scene than meets the eye...

list.name: Stones, Coconuts, and Saurian Traffickers
list.desc: In a remote location near the Flower-Feather Clan's borders, a traveling merchant and his Saurian companion have encountered a mysterious problem...

list.name: The Lone Isle Named Night
list.desc: You've discovered a hidden chamber deep within the Isle of Night...

list.name: The Story of "the Princess" and "the Adventure Team"
list.desc: You have met many members from the Narzissenkreuz Adventure Team and have worked hard to successfully rescue the "Princess." Now go to the "magical fountain" mentioned by Ann, and board the water entity in mid-air.

list.name: Ann's Story
list.desc: Continue onward.

list.name: Mary-Ann's Story
list.desc: You have arrived at "the real Annapausis."

list.name: Ann of the Narzissenkreuz
list.desc: A World Quest series following Ann, a tiny oceanid, to rescue "Princess Lyris" who's trapped in Annapausis.
